basic.description: In-depth exploration of selected topics related to Canadian theatre and drama.
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Canadian Theatre:Advanced Study

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    Level 4 and (reg in a DRAM Major or Medial Plan, or COCA-CODR Sub-Plan, or STSC Spec. Plan) and (a grade of B- in DRAM300) and (a GPA of 2.6 in DRAM) or permission of the Department.
